title: Know-Nothings, Do-Nothings, Mugwumps and Nerds, Oh My!
description:
The release of Bob Woodward's book "Fear" and the recent anonymous oped in the New York Times claiming to be by a senior official who is mounting the resistance to Trump from within the administration raise important questions about what is the best way to stop the threat posed by an unfit president.  Our panel, Rosa Brooks of Georgetown, Mieke Eoyang of Third Way and Kori Schake of IISS offer an examination of what's right, what works and whether the two are in any way related.  Join us!Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.
